RESOURCE.NAME: Date Annotation Normalizer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: provides normalized values for all existing date annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationFeature
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation feature to normalize

PARAMETER.NAME: wholeMatchOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: only normalize if the whole feature is parsed

PARAMETER.NAME: locale
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the locale to use for parsing dates, in the form lang(_country(_variant)?)? -- if left blank the system locale will be used

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation type produced by the PR

PARAMETER.NAME: dateFormat
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the format to store normalized dates in

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation set containing document date annotations to use for normalization

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the annotation set used to store output from this PR

PARAMETER.NAME: failOnMissingInputAnnotations
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Throw an exception when there are none of the required input annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: sourceOfDocumentDate
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the name of the annotations or document feature which hold the date of the document

PARAMETER.NAME: normalizedDocumentFeature
PARAMETER.COMMENT: the name of the document feature in which to put the normalized document date

PARAMETER.NAME: numericOutput
PARAMETER.COMMENT: if true the date is converted into a number of the form yyyymmdd and storred as an Integer

PARAMETER.NAME: corpus
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The corpus containing the document to process

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to process
